dmca.title: Game Site Wants Competitor Removed from Google's Listings
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the design (layout, background, CSS, graphics) of our website: www.filebot.org

2.	The website which is infringing our copyrighted work is: www.game-bargain.com. All pages except http://www.game-bargain.com/links.htm of this site are copied from our www.filebot.org website. Google indexed these website:

Search Query: allinurl: www.game-bargain.com site:www.game-bargain.com

Infringing Web Pages: all pages of www.game-bargain.com except www.game-bargain.com/links.htm

3.	Our company info: Shareup LLC [private] MIAMI FL 33166-[private] E-Mail: [private]@[private].com

4.	Contact info of administrator of www.game-bargain.com 
[private]@[private].com

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly Infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act an behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed
